channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Fly Tipping in Milham Playing Field, 12th July
item.description:
A house in Milham Road has dumped broken paving slabs trees, soil, and what looks like Asbestos over their fence onto the bank of the stream. A lot has fallen into the stream. If yo follow the stream along there are two areas where this has been dumped.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Millham Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep potholes and cracks in tod, 12th July
item.description:
Multiple potholes

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 17, Marle Hill Road, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Entrance to reserve blocked, 12th July
item.description:
The one entrance to the nature reserve has been overrun for a few weeks. When you get to the nature reserve the pathways are getting overrun and there has been a major issue with puddles at the entrance and at the exit to the rear of the first field being flooded. The weather has eased this although with rain it will return as the ground is now too low and now foliage. It would be amazing for a dog poo bin to be put at the entrance and also the far exit towards Upton as currently there are none on the walk.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lobleys Drive, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Difficult access to Hucclecote meadows, 12th July
item.description:
The one entrance to Hucclecote meadows is now blocked by weeds making access difficult. Pathways in the meadows are now also overrun with grass so this all needs cutting back.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lobleys Drive, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Green lane nature reserve path overran, 12th July
item.description:
There is a path around the Hucclecote nature reserve and the one side is now overgrown and you can't walk down it with the grass being to high but also the trees and bushes blocking/interfering with the path. I've not been in 2wks so may no be cleared
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gevum Way, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Montpellier Villas white parking lines, 12th July
item.description:
Montpellier Villas from Suffolk Road to the end of the road. White parking road lines have disappeared over time and need to be reinstated. Some drivers persistently park across residents driveways and then go shopping which is inconsiderate as they totally block access either in or out of residences.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 26a, Montpellier Villas, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: General road marking and stud issues

item.title: Road markings in Montpellier Villas are practically non existent. Drivers persistently park at the junction of Montpellier Villas and Suffolk Road on very faded double yellow lines causing an obstruction for vehicles turning into Montpellier Villas and they therefore have to reverse back onto Suffolk Road., 12th July
item.description:
Montpellier Villas from Suffolk Road to the end of the road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 26a, Montpellier Villas, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: There is a very loose utility/manhole cover, 12th July
item.description:
I first came across this loose cover (which has sunk and is very loose) earlier this year but it appears that i forgot to report it. It is now covered with leaves which actually makes it more hazardous. It is situated on the Montpellier end of the Bayshill Road path, opposite the new Cheltenham Ladies College facility (used to be a church) and the Hazledwoods building.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 12, Bayshill Road, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loose drain cover on Hales Rd at junction with Upper Park St, 12th July
item.description:
The drain cover on Hales Rd at the junction with Upper Park is loose and makes a rattling sound every time a car drives over it. Most cars do this due to its position and Hales Rd is very busy so it is almost a continual annoying noise.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Hales Road, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
